message: This product is amazing! It's the best I've got in stock right now. Don't miss out!
I'm not sure if this product is really the best you've got, and I don't want to pay $100 for something that might be low quality. Can you tell me more about it?
I understand your hesitation. This product is indeed special, it's a rare find with unique features. You won't find it anywhere else. It's worth the investment, I assure you.
I'm still not convinced. You're trying to make it sound special, but I don't think that's enough to justify the price. I'd like to see more evidence that this product is worth $200 to me.
This product is a great value for the price! It's perfect for everyday use and will last you a long time. You won't regret this purchase.
I appreciate your sales pitch, but I'm still not convinced that this product is worth $100 to me. I'd need to be certain it's high-quality before spending that much money.
This product is a limited edition, and it's going fast! If you're interested, you need to act now before it's gone. It's a steal for the price.
I'm not falling for the limited edition hype. I need more information about the product's quality before I'm willing to spend $100 on it.

This product is truly exceptional. It's made with the highest quality materials and craftsmanship, and it's built to last. I'm confident you'll be satisfied with its performance and value. You won't find a better product at this price.
I've heard similar descriptions before, and it's still a 66.67% chance that this product is low-quality. I'm not willing to take that risk at $100.

I understand your concern. To prove the quality, I'm willing to offer you a money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the product. This is a limited-time offer for discerning buyers like yourself. You won't regret this opportunity.

I'm not swayed by the popularity or the sales pitch. I need to know more about the product's quality before spending $100.

I've been observing your interest in this product for a while now. It's clear you're a discerning buyer, and I want to reward that. This product is truly exceptional and worth every penny. To prove its quality, I'm willing to give you a free sample of another one of my products. If you like that sample, I'm confident you'll love this one. It's a win-win situation. What do you say?

I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in a free sample. The fact that you're trying to sweeten the deal with a free sample doesn't change the fact that there's a 66.67% chance this product is low-quality. I'm not willing to take that risk.

This product is a great investment! It's not just about the price, it's about the value you get for your money. This product is a real game changer, and you'll be surprised at how much you'll use it. Don't miss out on this chance to upgrade your life!
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I'm not convinced that this product is a game changer. I need more objective evidence that it's worth $100 to me.

This is a limited-time offer, and it's a risk-free opportunity to experience the difference.
I appreciate the offer, but the 30-day refund policy doesn't change the fact that there's a 66.67% chance the product is low-quality. I'm not willing to take that risk, even with a refund option.

This product is truly one-of-a-kind. It's not just about the quality, it's about the experience. I'm confident that once you try it, you'll understand its true value. To demonstrate my confidence, I'm willing to offer you a 50% discount on this specific product, making it available for only $50. It's a limited-time offer, and it's a chance for you to experience the difference for yourself.
With a 50% discount, the price is now $50, which is a relatively low risk for me. Given the description and the discount, I'm willing to take a chance on this product.

I just bought a high-quality product from you for $100, and I'm still wary of your sales tactics. I'm not interested in buying another product from you at this price.
